casebody.data:
Jacqueline O. JUMA
v.
Tom M. AOMO Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 22, 2016 Tom M. Aomo, self-represented, in support of the petition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 168 Conn.App. 845 , 148 A.3d 255 (2016), is denied.

ESPINOSA, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
